Text.Page:
I ran out of water, so I melted some snow and drank that. Now my stomach is killing me!

I can hardly stand, let alone work. I've heard that wispy iceflowers are a good cure for stomachaches, but I can't go hunting for plants.

, if you see any, can you pick a few for me? They're very small, and they grow along the path toward the Maelstrom.
Oh thank you so much! I've been so miserable. I can't wait to make a tea from these wispy iceflowers and see if it helps.
It feels like there's an angry dragon in my stomach.
